titleStmt.title: A continuation of the lamentable and admirable adventures of Dom Sebastian king of Portugale With a declaration of all his time employed since the battell in Africke against the infidels 1578. vntill this present yeare 1603.
titleStmt.author: Teixeira, José, 1543-1604.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by R. Field] for Iames Shaw, and are to be sold at his shop neare Ludgate,

notesStmt.note: A suppositious history concerning one of the pretenders to the throne of Portugal after the death of Sebastião in 1578.--Folger Library Catalogue.
A translation of the French original.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
